archimate:Requirement.name: R9.2 ESA Community allows interaction
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U4 As Head of Enteprise Security Architecture I want to provide a place where architects can interact to leverage the skills of our architects and break the silos. U6 As Head of Enteprise Security Architecture I want to provide a place where architects can interact to positively motivate ESA amogst the community U20 As ESA community member I want todiscuss ESA with colleagues to get new perspectives on solving problems.
